title: Genesis
description: Rick Bettina, Nash Bridges and his team investigate a case of stolen computer chips which cost several millions of dollars. Nash's ex-partner, Joe Dominguez, joins them. Nash and his second wife, Kelly, divorce.

title: Home Invasion
description: A gang robs a Chinese family. Later Nash kills one of their members in a shooting. They decide to pay Nash a night visit when they find out about it. Joe, Kelly and Cassidy happen to be at his place that night.

title: Javelin Catcher
description: When a rocket launcher knows as a Javelin is stolen from an Army base, Nash works with the Army Captain responsible for it. In the meantime, the man who paid to have it stolen is desperate to get it. Evan and Harvey are investigating who is attacking male prostitutes.

title: The Counterfeiters
description: Nash and the SIU uncover a counterfeiting group where the money is top-of-the-line Supernote quality. Moving in to bust the group, they discover a fake SIU gang impersonating the police. Cooperation becomes tense as suspicions abound over who and what to trust. In the interim, as Nick gets in over his head financially with his horse costs, Nash reluctantly agrees to work with Joe on an off-duty case searching for a Super Bowl ring. However, Nash and Joe soon find themselves impersonating a gay couple as the case develops differently than Nash anticipated.

title: Gun Play
description: Nash and Joe are chasing down a suspect when Nash gets a phone call. He learns that his daughter, Cassidy, has been shot at school. At the hospital, Nash gets another call. This one is from his father, Nick, who informs Nash that city construction workers are at their home unannounced. Nash apparently signed a waiver when he moved in giving the city permission to tear the place up to fix earthquake damage. To make a terrible day worse, Nash meets Cassidy's new, older boyfriend, Freddie.

title: One Flew Over the Cuda's Nest
Blackout
description: Nash has to figure out the details of his undercover operation after he loses his short term memory because of an explosion.

title: Most Wanted
description: A criminal is released from jail by mistake and wants revenge on Michelle. Nash teams with Michelle to capture him. Meanwhile, Nash refuses to partner with Joe on an off duty case to protect a sportscaster being blackmailed.

title: Downtime
description: Bettina, upon learning that Nash has nearly a year's worth of vacation time, tells him to take it. In the meantime he brings in a new guy to fill in, and he starts by investigating a murder with Joe. Nash tries to find a way to get back.

title: Apocalypse Nash
description: Nash butts heads with a cop whom Nash thinks is dirty. When he kills him and two other cops, he arrested because there's some personal stuff between them which is believed to be the actual motive for their feud. Bettina is assigned to defend Nash and he brings in a cop from Internal Afffairs, Caitlin Cross to find out the truth. But she's operating under the assumption that Nash is guilty. Nash also claims that he thinks that there was another man at the shoot out, who got away, whom he thinks is their partner.

title: Truth and Consequences
description: When a Mexican actress is shot at a premiere, Nash investigates. A reporter who was there, thinks that an actor whom the actress was involved with and broke up with, is the shooter. But Nash tells her to hold off until they have investigated it thoroughly. Later a man claims to have a video of the shooter and will sell it to the highest bidder but Nash arrests him for withholding evidence.

title: Kill Switch
description: When a witness chooses not to testify against some punks whom she saw kill someone because her family was being threatened. The prosecutor asks Nash to prove that they threatened the witness and he does. Later the witness is killed. They think the guys tried to make sure she didn't talk so they try to bring them in but one of them is killed. Which now makes them think they have vigilante. And an investigation leads them to suspect the prosecutor and she is belligerent when they question her. In the meantime Evan gets in trouble and calls Cassidy for help.

title: Jackpot: Part 1
description: When someone kills the Police Chief, Nash sets out to find the one responsible but his efforts are hindered by a government agent who wants to arrest the Nash seeks for something she feels is important than murder.

title: Grave Robbers
description: Tony B is supposed to be dead, but his funeral leads Nash back to an old nemesis and blast from his past. Nick gets arrested for protesting the impending demolition of a building. Cassie goes on the hunt to find why this building is so important to Nick and how it ties into his past. Joe is accused by Inger of using marijuana, and Ulla is to blame. We find out about Nash's grandmother.

title: Fair Game
description: Nash and company track down a serial killer who picks people up in a cab; Rachel reveals the truth about what she's been up to at the SIU; and Cassidy debates whether she wants to be a cop anymore. Though not officially advertised at the time of airing, this was the series finale.
